nws_periods.name: Overnight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 75. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Thursday
nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 89, with temperatures falling to around 85 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Thursday Night
nws_periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 75. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Friday
nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 7am and 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 1pm and 4pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 90. Southeast wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws_periods.name: Friday Night
nws_periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 76. Southeast wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws_periods.name: Saturday
nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 10am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly sunny, with a high near 92. Southeast wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws_periods.name: Saturday Night
nws_periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Mostly Clear
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 75. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws_periods.name: Sunday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 97. Northwest wind 0 to 5 mph.

nws_periods.name: Sunday Night
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 75. West wind around 5 mph.

nws_periods.name: Monday Night
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 78.

nws_periods.name: Tuesday
nws_periods.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 100. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
